Peach Leaf Curl.severity_mild: Leaves may curl slightly but the plant remains healthy overall.
Peach Leaf Curl.severity_moderate: Leaves show significant curling and discoloration, affecting plant health.
Peach Leaf Curl.severity_severe: Leaves are severely curled and discolored, leading to potential death of the plant if untreated.
prevention: Regularly inspect plants for early signs of disease
